ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We would like to acknowledge Juha Määttä, Niklas Kähkönen and Ulla Kiiskinen, for help in preparing the antigens. Similarly, we would like to acknowledge Tytti Vuorinen and the University Hospital of Turku for delivering serum samples from patients suffering from acute enterovirus infections and running the IgM assays. The steering group of the Finnish Diabetes Prediction and Prevention (DIPP) study is gratefully acknowledged for their contribution for providing us with well characterized samples from young children. Finnish Clinical Biobank Tampere is acknowledged for the serum samples they have provided us with.
